title: 820-4924 Screen Backlight  ONLY comes on when lid is closed then open
message: 820-4924 the Screen Backlight  only comes on when lid is closed then open if lid is open and you hit power the mac boots up with no display until you close the lid and open then it comes on what is the problem thanks

title: 820-4924 Screen Backlight  ONLY comes on when lid is closed then open
message: Wrong lcd year model, for sure

title: 820-4924 Screen Backlight  ONLY comes on when lid is closed then open
message:
Be sure to have compatible LCD assembly.
Post SMC_LID level when the problem occurs.
